title: MESMERIC HEALING WITH REJANE / NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS
description:
In this video, Dr. Marco Paret's student Rejane is demonstrating mesmeric healing with a spontaneous crisis. Dr. Paret's students are using the powerful non-verbal techniques that they learned in his school. The hypnotized subject entered a hypnotic crisis, which is very helpful and liberating. The magnetic passes helped to deepen the state. After, the subject woke up completely transformed in a positive way. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
